data.name: MSG1001_AnalyzingTarget_Description
data.value: An analysis target was analyzed.

data.name: Notification_ExceptionInAnalyze
data.value: An exception was raised analyzing '{0}' for check '{1}' (which has been disabled for the remainder of the analysis). The exception may have resulted from a problem related to parsing image metadata and not specific to the rule, however.

data.name: Notification_ExceptionInCanAnalyze
data.value: An exception was raised attempting to determine whether '{0}' is a valid analysis target for check '{1}' (which has been disabled for the remainder of the analysis). The exception may have resulted from a problem related to parsing the analysis target and not specific to the rule, however.

data.name: Notification_ExceptionCreatingLogFile
data.value: Could not create output file '{0}'.

data.name: Notification_UnhandledEngineException
data.value: An exception was raised during analysis.

data.name: Notification_ExceptionInInitialize
data.value: An exception was raised initializing check '{0}' (which has been disabled for the remainder of the analysis).

data.name: Notification_ExceptionLoadingPlugIn
data.value: Could not load the plug-in '{0}'.

data.name: Notification_ExceptionLoadingAnalysisTarget
data.value: Could not load analysis target '{0}'.

data.name: MSG1002_InvalidTarget_Description
data.value: A file was skipped as it does not appear to be a valid target for analysis.

data.name: Notification_MissingRuleConfiguration
data.value: Check '{0}' was disabled while analyzing '{1}' because the analysis was not configured with required policy ({2}). To resolve this, configure and provide a policy file on the {3} command-line using the --policy argument (recommended), or pass '--config default' to invoke built-in settings. Invoke the {3} 'exportConfig' command to produce an initial configuration file that can be edited, if necessary, and passed back into the tool.

data.name: MSG1002_InvalidFileType
data.value: '{0}' was not analyzed as it does not appear to be a valid file type for analysis.

data.name: MSG1002_InvalidMetadata
data.value: '{0}' was not evaluated for check '{1}:{2}' as the analysis is not relevant based on observed metadata: {3}.

data.name: MSG_UnexpectedApplicationExit
data.value: Analysis halted prematurely due to a fatal execution condition.

data.name: MSG1001_AnalyzingTarget
data.value: Analyzing '{0}'...

data.name: MSG_AnalysisCompletedSuccessfully
data.value: Analysis completed successfully.

data.name: MSG_AnalysisIncomplete
data.value: Analysis finished but was not complete due to non-fatal runtime errors.

data.name: MSG_Analyzing
data.value: Analyzing...

data.name: Notification_ExceptionInstantiatingSkimmers
data.value: Could not instantiate skimmers from the following plugins: {0}.

data.name: Notification_ExceptionLoadingPdb
data.value: '{0}' was not evaluated for check '{1}' because its PDB could not be loaded.

data.name: Notification_NoRulesLoaded
data.value: Could not instantiate any analysis rules.

data.name: Notification_NoValidAnalysisTargets
data.value: No valid analysis targets were specified.

data.name: Notification_ExceptionAccessingFile
data.value: Could not access a file specified on the command line: '{0}'.

data.name: Notification_MissingFile
data.value: A required file specified on the command line could not be found: '{0}'.
